title: He doubts that there are Islamic Banks in Singapore, can he open an account with them Maybank
transcript: Muhammad from Singapore Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh There are only a few Islamic banks in my country and I doubt that there are two real Islamic banks. Is it permissible to open an account with them? Islamic banks? Yes. In Singapore I think you have Maybank and Maybank is an Islamic bank to my knowledge. So yes you can do that Alhamdulillah without any problem and Allah Azza Wa Jal knows best.
